A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am glad I skipped watching this in theaters. I rented it and I was completely disappointed in how they ruined Luke Skywalker's character. Plot holes throughout\, nonsensical story telling. Many times throughout the film I felt that it was pandering to make a political statement than focusing on the creating a good film.\n\nAs someone who love the original Episodes 4-6. Was disappointed in episodes 1-3. Now I lost complete faith in this 7-9 series. Disney and the people they hired destroyed this franchise. Do not bother watching this movie.
